processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section canadenses;species amicalis;

treatment.description: Very similar to no. 148 and perhaps a phase of it; differing in having scattered slender prickles on the canes (2-10 per dm.); petioles of primocane-leaves smooth or only sparsely prickly; the unarmed leaflets relatively narrow, the median ones tapering to a cuneate or subcuneate base and on short petiolules (3-13 mm. long); raceme rather short, its lower bracteal leaves or leaflets toothed to base, the -pedicels 1-3.5 cm. long.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: N.B. and N.S. to sw. Me.
